keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committing to a further Income Tax cut. Over 40,000 households across Crawley have benefited from a rise in the personal allowance.
A further funding increase for the NHS – in Crawley and throughout our country.
Continuing support for an in/out UK/EU referendum, and standing up for Crawley, England and Great Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: Continuing support for an in/out UK/EU referendum, and standing up for Crawley, England and Great Britain.
issues.economy: Committing to a further Income Tax cut.
issues.health: A further funding increase for the NHS – in Crawley and throughout our country.

images.caption: Henry Smith - My priorities for Crawley
